about_the_game:
Welcome to Casino Management Simulator! Get ready to embark on an exciting journey where you take control of a small casino with big dreams. Your goal? Transform this modest establishment into a legendary gambling empire!



Hire: Recruit a team of skilled staff members, including dealers, bartender, and security.
Salaries: Manage salaries to keep your staff motivated and productive while balancing your budget.



Floor Planning: Design the layout of your casino, strategically placing tables, slot machines, and amenities to maximize guest satisfaction and revenue.
Decor and Theme: Choose from a variety of themes and decor options to create a unique and inviting atmosphere that attracts a diverse clientele.




Variety of Games: Offer a wide range of gambling options such as blackjack, roulette, craps, and slot machines. Keep an eye on trends and introduce new games to keep things fresh.



Entertainment and Amenities: Provide additional attractions like bars to enhance the guest experience.
VIP Services: Cater to high rollers with exclusive VIP areas, personalized service, and special perks.



Budgeting: Keep a close eye on your finances, managing expenses and investments to ensure profitability.
Odds and Payouts: Adjust the odds and payouts to find the perfect balance between profitability and guest satisfaction.
Marketing and Promotions: Run marketing campaigns and special promotions to attract new guests.



Economic Fluctuations: Adapt to changing economic conditions that affect guest spending and casino operations.
Random Events: Handle unexpected events such as security issues that can impact your casino.



Expansion: As your casino grows, buy new games to keep guests entertained.
Personalization: Customize every aspect of your casino to reflect your vision and style.

Gameplay Tips:

Market Research: Regularly check guest feedback and market trends to meet guest demands.
Risk Management: Be prepared for unexpected challenges and have contingency plans in place to minimize disruptions.

Good luck, and may fortune be on your side as you build your casino empire in Casino Management Simulator!

name: Casino Management Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Run your own casino in "Casino Management Simulator"! Manage staff, games, and finances to build your gambling empire. Keep guests entertained to become the ultimate casino tycoon!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
